# Question 1
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
Data=data.matrix(read.table("InterestRates.txt", header=FALSE))
# head(Data)
ggplot(as.data.frame(t(Data)),aes(x=1:length(Data[1,]))) + geom_line(aes(y=V1, col="January 2002")) + geom_line(aes(y=V250, col="January 2003")) + geom_line(aes(y=V500,col="January 2004")) + geom_line(aes(y=V750, col="January 2005"))  + geom_line(aes(y=V1000, col="January 2006")) + labs(x="maturity",y="YTM",title="YTM curves",col="")
```
